quest.name: I am the Sunshine
journal:
Haermaga is eager to offer Costa Del Sol the protection of the Sunshine Savior.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Reeve informs Haermaga that he has asked you to help him learn the ins and outs of helping people in need. The chaperone is keen on this idea, and revises Reeve's tasks, instructing him to keep watch over the people celebrating on the northeastern shores of Costa Del Sol. There, you are to offer advice on who is most in need of a heroic rescue, and how exactly Reeve should go about it.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

With your steady hand to guide him, Reeve is able to leave the shores of Costa Del Sol even safer than they were when he arrived. Every savior needs rest, however, and Beaudefoin soon arrives to take over watch duty. Reeve is eager to share tidings of his success with Haermaga, and asks you to accompany him.

Haermaga is pleased with Reeve's progress, and explains that his costume is modeled after the phoenix of legend. Just like that legendary bird, the chaperone hopes that Reeve can be reborn, and thus recover his lost confidence. This hope is soon tested when a shark appears on Costa Del Sol, and Reeve drives it back in a display of bravery that could move even the most cold-hearted miser. After the fight, Reeve stands dumbfounded at his own actions─he may require your help one final time to be led in the right direction.

Your arrival returns Reeve to his senses, and he is at last able to meet the eyes of the people he has just saved. While he looks to have suffered no more than surface wounds, Haermaga instructs him to visit the healer's tent. The chaperone asks you to stay behind to keep watch for any further fiends.

Your watch is uneventful, and Reeve returns with mask doffed and a smile on his face. For your part on bringing the young adventurer into his own, Haermaga makes you an honorary Sunshin Savior, rewarding you with the selfsame costume that gave Reeve the confidence for heroics. You are now free to enjoy the Moonfire Faire and all its pleasures, for the savior of the sands watches over you.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Forename, under your guidance, I know I can make the Sunshine Savior the talk of Costa Del Sol!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: It seems our most pressing problem has been solved, eh? How're you feeling, Reeve? Up for the task ahead?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text:
どうだリーヴ、
ヒーロー士としての心構えはできたか？

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: About that... As much as I'd like to jump right into the thick of things, there's is one doubt yet niggling at my conscience.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: The incident with the merchant made me realize that it's one matter to want to aid those in need, but another matter entirely to know who wants to be aided.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Fortunately, I have Forename by my side─they seem to have an uncanny knack for finding troubled souls. I've asked herhim to take me under herhis wing for a bit, and I hope to be a quick study.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: That's a capital idea, lad. Every adventurer has a few stories of being rewarded with scorn instead of coin. Strange as it sounds, a helping hand must be deft besides.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Well then, let's revise your tasks, eh? Give you a chance to sharpen that nose of yours to the scent of unrest.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Why don't you stand watch over the revelers gathered at the northeastern shores. If you spot trouble brewing, I want you to put a lid on it before it spills over.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Forename will attend you in a supervisory capacity. Before leaping into action, ask herhim for advice on who to talk with and what to say. She'llHe'll guide you well, I reckon.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Now then, off with you! The battlefield of adventure awaits─make me proud, you two, make me proud!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: A guild member by the name of Beaudefoin is standing by to be relived of his duty. Speak with him first, then show the realm the measure of a Sunshine Savior!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: This is it, Forename! It's time to prove myself worthy of being the Sunshine Savior!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Beaudefoin should be patrolling the northeastern shores, assuming he hasn't caught a nap under some shade somewhere. Relieve him of his post, and I hope to soon hear tidings of your success!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Why if it isn't the Sunshine Savior, protector of the summer sands! Please, please, I release the beaches of Costa Del Sol to your stewardship!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The following event cannot be skipped. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.

dialogue.name: Q50
dialogue.text: Relieve Beaudefoin of his duty?

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, before I go, allow me to furnish you with this linkpearl. A crucial tool for a duo of strapping guardians such as yourselves. Godsspeed, saviors!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: And now our watch begins! Go on, Forename, tell me what you see. If there is trouble lurking about, the Sunshine Savior shall rise to action!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What do you see?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: A young Mi'qote lad and his lady companion look like a sellsword just stole their lunch.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: A surly pirate lass is sizing up a nearby man. Quite intensely, by the looks of it.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Grrgg...failed again. I'll never master the Nimble Warrior course. At this rate, I'll have to wait until next summer...

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: I know you can do it, Brother!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Hmm...but I've given you all the encouragement I can. If only there was someone else who knew just what to say to lift your spirits.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: That boy looks absolutely crestfallen. From what I can gather, he's having some difficulties with the Nimble Warrior course. I know what it's like when success keep slipping out of one's grasp...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What should Reeve do?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Show him how a Sunshine Savior does it!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Give him some words of encouragement!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Leave him be. He'll learn more by doing it himself.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: You want me to attempt the Nimble Warrior course? I'm equal to the challenge, you can be sure, but that would mean leaving the others unprotected.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: If you ask me, it looks like the lad needs a few words of encouragement to set him straight. Yes, that should do the trick. Forename, wait here─I'll be back in a flash!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: You read my mind, Forename! Encouragement is my forte! A few carefully placed words should lift this lad over the obstacle in his path. Wait here─I'll be back in a flash!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I see the wisdom in that, truly I do. But I can't help but recall my own struggles─where would I have ended up if you and Master Haermaga didn't come along with a few kinds words?

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Surely it couldn't hurt, could it? Wait here, Forename─I'll be back before you can think of a reason to object!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: The pair were thankful enough, and the boy seemed once again eager to tackle the Nimble Warrior course. All in all, a success for the Sunshine Savior!

dialogue.name: RHOSWEN
dialogue.text: Bloody Carvallain, thinks he's too good for a pirate, does he?

dialogue.name: RHOSWEN
dialogue.text: I'll make him see, I will. If I just ask him all nicelike... “Fancy a stroll on the beach, Carvallain?” or somesuch... Bah, he'll just think I'm itchin' fer a duel!

dialogue.name: RHOSWEN
dialogue.text:
「奇遇だねえ、あたしとサシで少し浜辺を歩かないかい？」
……いやいや、これじゃあ決闘の申し込みだと思われちまう！

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: She's mumbling to herself an awful lot. The menacing provocations of a pirate, no doubt. What do you think, Forename?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What should Reeve do?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Just ask if something's the matter.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Don't worry about her. Worry about the man!

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: We should watch from a safe distance.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I think you have the right of it here. Truth be told, this has the look of something dangerous. I'd best insinuate myself into the matter before it takes a turn.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text:
了解した！
あんなにじーっと見られてるなんて、ただごとじゃないもんな。
警戒したほうがいいって伝えてくるぜ。

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: She left in a hurry, with nary a word of explanation. Did I interrupt something? Ah, well, there was no violence, so as far as I'm concerned, the Sunshine Savior can mark down a victory in his ledger.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Are you certain? This has the scent of danger...or is that just the food stall? Ah, no matter, I shall trust your advice. It's what you're here for, after all!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Hmm, I'm beginning to understand. She wishes to say something, but it's caught in her throat like a bone.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: ...Ah, she's given up. Perhaps she, too, cannot bear to face another with a bare face. Is that why pirates hide their faces with patches and bandanas?

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Alas, I have but a single mask, so I couldn't have been of help even if I wanted. Regardless, it seems your instincts served us well. Not that I had any doubt they would!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Well, all I see are smiles in this area. What about over there?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What do you see?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: A group of revelers are entranced by the Nimble Warrior course.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: A muscular fellow is slumped over on the ground.

dialogue.name: MOBA04724
dialogue.text: (-Faire Reveler-)Go on, jump! Jump like your life depends on it!

dialogue.name: MOBA04724
dialogue.text: (-Faire Reveler-)You'll never make it from there...! Watch out or you'll eat sand!

dialogue.name: MOBB04724
dialogue.text: (-Faire Reveler-)Oh no, are you all right? That looked painful! I think I heard a snap...

dialogue.name: Q5
dialogue.text: What should Reeve do?

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Pay attention, Reeve!

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: Help them!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I'm coming!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Phew... Before I knew it, I was under the surface...

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Some water got into my mask, and I thought I'd meet my end then and there... But somehow I found my bearings, and I was able to bring that man to shore! Fortune favors the reckless, eh?

dialogue.name: MOBC04724
dialogue.text: (Muscle-bound Roegadyn)<huff> <huff> ...

dialogue.name: KHLOEALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Are you all right, sir?

dialogue.name: MOBD04724
dialogue.text: (Muscle-bound Roegadyn)My muscles cushioned the brunt of the fall, but... Gods, I can barely see straight...

dialogue.name: ZHLOEALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Oh no, that's not good! Perhaps a member of the guild can help!?

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I suppose this heat and intense exercise mix as well as oil and water. Should I go for help?

dialogue.name: Q6
dialogue.text: What should Reeve do?

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Tell him to find a spot of shade to rest in.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Tell him to drink plenty of fluids.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: Look at all those muscles. He'll be fine.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: You're quite right! Even the strongest of us will wither before the sun without water and shade. I'll go and tell him as much!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I see that, but what use are muscles before the pitiless rays of the sun? At the very least, I should recommend a short constitutional.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I had a word with the man, and he insists that there's nothing to worry about. Still, my duty is to dig out the roots of trouble before they break soil, so in that respect I consider this a success.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, I see no further signs of distress along the beach. I believe our relief should be along soon, and not a moment too soon. I can't bear this stifling heat for much longer...

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: As bad as this heat is, I'd rather spend an eternity baking under the sun than another moment under those waves... Every time I breathed, more water filled my lungs... I wager at least one of the hells is deep beneath the ocean surface.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I'm grateful to be alive and well, and with a few feats of derring-do under my belt besides. That's in no small part thanks to you, Forename─your sound guidance led me to take action where I might have been paralyzed by doubt.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I have Haermaga's costume to thank, as well. It may very well have some special power to turn the timid into the lionhearted...

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Impressive work, you two! I say you've earned some rest, eh? Allow me to watch over our patrons─I can only hope my stretch is half as eventful as yours was!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Much appreciated! Now, I suspect Master Haermaga will want to hear of our successes here. Let's go and make our report.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text:
では、お言葉に甘えて……
報告がてら、ヘールマガの旦那のところへ向かいましょうか。

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I know I yet have a long journey ahead of me, but I hope that I've taken at least a few bounding strides toward my goal.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are! The whispers of your deeds precede you─revelers up and down the beaches are taken with your bravery.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: The one you saved even came to offer his personal thanks. By all accounts, your lost confidence has been restored and then some. I suspect you're ready to set off on your own, but I wouldn't force it upon you if you've got lingering reservations.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I... Well, truth be told, I wouldn't have been able to do it without Forename's help. And this mask, of course─donning it makes me forget the meaning of the word “impossible.”

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Hmm... You have to realize that Forename won't be around forever, so inclined to adventuring abroad as shehe is. A savior needs to be able to carry their burden alone if they aim to be trusted by others.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Maybe we should start with this aversion to letting others see your face. Something tells me you weren't born this way. Am I right?

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Aye. It happened when I was just getting my feet wet as an adventurer, you see. It was a routine job, even for an initiate...

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: We were guarding a merchant caravan, which naturally drew the attention of a terrible, slavering beast. Instead of sticking it with a spear like I was supposed to, I was the first one knocked out.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: When I came to, I saw that my partner had been dealt a grievous wound and the caravan was in shambles─the job was an utter failure. For a blessing, none lost their lives, but I lost all standing in the eyes of my allies and employers.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: They blamed me for the injuries and damage to their goods, and rightfully so. The memory of their scornful gazes is etched in my mind, and I see them every time I look another in the eyes.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: So you coped with the memory by hiding behind a helm. It's starting to make sense...

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: You know, Reeve, there's a bit of meaning behind this design I neglected to mention before, but it seems luck's given me the perfect chance to fix that mistake.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: See, it was meant to evoke the image of the phoenix. That legendary bird that serves as the symbol of rebirth, rising from the ashes over and over again in a blaze of rebirth.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Seeing your triumphs as a Sunshine Savior has made me sure that that same fire burns within you. And when it's flames are stoked, you'll be reborn, every bit the brave soul you were before.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: All this time, I was wrapped in the phoenix's embrace... Yes, if there's a chance I too might be born anew, I must continue!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I'm heading back to the beach─this time without a mask!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Something on your mind? Did I lay it on too thick?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: When you get to my age, you can't help but light fires under arses that need 'em. You get what I'm saying, eh?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: And that lad needed something a little hotter than a piddling campfire, so I gave him a raging bonfire! Just had to work with the embers that were already there─that burning desire of his to help the downtrodden.

dialogue.name: MOBA04724
dialogue.text: (-Distant Scream-)M-m-m-monster!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Curses...powerless again!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Stand down, Forename! If someone jumps to his rescue again, that fire I just lit will fade away. We need to think of a way to help him that doesn't involve doing all the heavy lifting.

dialogue.name: Q30
dialogue.text: What will you shout?

dialogue.name: A30
dialogue.text: The Sunshine Saviors never back down!

dialogue.name: A30
dialogue.text: Rise from the ashes of defeat, and be reborn!

dialogue.name: A30
dialogue.text: No monster can stand against Reeve!

dialogue.name: A30
dialogue.text: If Reeve can't do it, no one can!

dialogue.name: MOB04724
dialogue.text: (-Moonfire Reveler-)She'sHe's right! Your our Sunshine Savior! So save us!

dialogue.name: MOB04724
dialogue.text: (-Moonfire Reveler-)Give this beast the what for!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: They really...have faith in me?

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I can't let them down. I must uphold the reputation of the Sunshine Saviors!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Gyaaaaaahhh!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: Bathe in the flames of my rebirth! I shall rise above your ashes a new man!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: The lad looks unharmed─a small miracle, all things considered.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: I only saw from a distance, but that was enough to take in the spectacle. Reeve really made stew out of that shark, didn't he? I would have never thought he was capable just a short while ago.

dialogue.name: KHLOEALIAPOH
dialogue.text: That was so scary, but so exciting at the same time! I'll have to write this down in my diary!

dialogue.name: ZHLOEALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Thanks to your bravery, no one came to harm. Thank you, thank you!

dialogue.name: TKEBBE
dialogue.text: クロちゃん、だいじょうぶ……？

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: あー、ええと……大丈夫だったか？

dialogue.name: KHLOEALIAPOH
dialogue.text: That was so scary, but so exciting at the same time! I'll have to write this down in my diary!

dialogue.name: ZHLOEALIAPOH
dialogue.text: Thanks to your bravery, no one came to harm. Thank you, thank you!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: But I didn't─ Ah, never mind that. You're most welcome, of course.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: I'm not sure what to call what just happened, but the word “miracle” comes to mind. Did I truly drive back that bloodthirsty shark?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: That you did, and without a single hair on our guests coming to harm. As for yourself, I see nothing more than scratches, but it'd be best to get you looked at just in case.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text:
とはいえ手傷は負っただろう？
ボドゥフォアンに案内してもらって、手当を受けてくるといい。

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: You stay, Forename. We should keep an eye on things, lest any other seaborne predators decide on being bold today.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Ah, you've returned. With the sun on your face and wind in your hair, no less.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Thanks to you two, talk of the Adventurers' Guild is on the lips of everyone in Costa Del Sol. As far as I'm concerned, we can consider the Sunshine Savior a rousing success and a boon for the guild.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Reeve here deserves a standing ovation for the bravery he displayed. Taking down a shark of that size and keeping the younglings is a feat very few can boast of, and puts you among very esteemed company.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: As my vision dimmed, I heard Forename call out to me. It was herhis words that delivered me from the brink, and allowed me to go further still.

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: They might call me the Sunshine Savior, but you're the true hero of the day. You've given me the courage to go on alone, and for that there is no way I can repay you.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Indeed our savior had a savior of his own. A fact we're all grateful for, to be sure.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: I'm of a mind to make you an honorary Sunshine Savior, suit and all. Wear it well, and don't ask me how many more of these I have stashed away.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Now, I encourage you to forget your worries and take in your fill of the festivities, for the Moonfire Faire is safe so long as Reeve here stands as your guardian!

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text:
それじゃ、俺はもう一度見回りに行ってきます。
大丈夫、たとえ何が来ようとも、浜辺の平和は……

dialogue.name: REEVE
dialogue.text: 俺が！　絶対に！！　護ってみせますから！！！

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Allow me to accompany him. 'Twould be a shame if the savior of the sands fell victim to the sun after so great a deed.
